comment: Elizabeth Warren releases DNA results. The results: % Braindead % Stupid % Insane % Delusional % Bowel blockage % Turnip .0001% Indian
amr:
# ::snt Elizabeth Warren releases DNA results. The results: % Braindead % Stupid % Insane % Delusional % Bowel blockage % Turnip .0001% Indian
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / release-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Elizabeth"
                        :op2 "Warren"))
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG2-of (r2 / result-01
                        :ARG1 (n2 / nucleic-acid
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "DNA")))))
      :snt2 r2
      :ARG2 (a / and
            :op1 (b / braindead
                  :domain (p2 / person))
            :op2 (s / stupid
                  :domain p2)
            :op3 (ii / Insane
                  :domain p2)
            :op4 (d / delude-01
                  :ARG1 p2)
            :op5 (b2 / block-01
                  :ARG1 (b3 / bowel))
            :op6 (t2 / turnip
                  :mod (p3 / percentage-entity
                        :value 0.0001)
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "India")))))
